item.title: 2024 Box Office Report Card: Bollywood struggles outside of Stree 2, Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, Munjya and Shaitaan; Collects Rs 2500 crore - PINKVILLA
item.description:
2024 Box Office Report Card: Bollywood struggles outside of Stree 2, Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, Munjya and Shaitaan; Collects Rs 2500 crore

Date & Source: Updated on Dec 27, 2024 | Himesh Mankad

2024 has been a challenging year for Bollywood, with only 32 major films released and a total box office collection of approximately 2500 crore. This is the weakest theatrical year for the industry since 2012.

  • The biggest grosser was Stree 2, earning Rs 585 crore.
  • Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 followed closely, grossing Rs 247 crore.
  • Franchise films dominated the box office, while original content struggled.
  • Failures included major stars in films like Merry Christmas and Chandu Champion.
"It's a drop of 43 percent over 2023, where the Hindi Film Industry collected Rs 4418 crore."

Filmmakers are urged to diversify their genres to attract audiences back to theaters in 2025.

item.title: Mika Singh recollects KRK's feud with Kapil Sharma, Honey Singh: ‘Kapil broke glass at his house, Honey pulled his hair’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Mika Singh Discusses KRK's Feuds with Kapil Sharma and Honey Singh

Date: Dec 27, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Mika Singh recently recalled the controversial encounters between Kamaal R Khan (KRK) and celebrities Kapil Sharma and Honey Singh during an interview.

  • Mika describes his close relationship with KRK, calling him 'like a son' and a 'lovely human being.'
  • He shared an incident where Honey Singh reacted to KRK's comments with aggression.
  • In another incident, Kapil Sharma went to confront KRK but ended up causing chaos at his home.
“He is like my son. He is a very pyara insaan (lovely person).” – Mika Singh

This reflection on past encounters highlights the tumultuous relationships in the Bollywood industry, particularly as it relates to KRK's notorious reputation for controversy.

item.title: Sikandars teaser delay: The UNTOLD story on how Salman Khan prioritized respect over celebration on his birthday amid national mourning - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Salman Khan Delays Sikandar Teaser Out of Respect Amid National Mourning

Publication Date: December 27, 2024 | Source: Bollywood Hungama

On December 26, Salman Khan announced the teaser release of his upcoming film Sikandar, coinciding with his birthday. However, following the passing of ex-Prime Minister Manmohan Singh, the teaser was postponed to show respect. While fans expressed disappointment, industry insiders praised the decision.

  • The teaser for Sikandar was set to release on Salman Khan's birthday, December 27.
  • Dr. Manmohan Singh's unexpected death prompted the postponement.
  • Insiders revealed that both Salman Khan and Sajid Nadiadwala prioritized national mourning over publicity.
  • Sikandar, directed by A R Murugadoss, features Rashmika Mandanna and is scheduled for release on Eid 2025.
“Salman is the man with a golden heart. He knows to take the right step.”

This incident underscores the importance of sensitivity in the public eye, as both fan expectations and national sentiments collide.

item.title: Ram Charan reveals the scene in RRR that made him jealous of Jr NTR - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan reveals the scene in RRR that made him jealous of Jr NTR

Published on Dec 27, 2024

Tollywood stars Ram Charan and Jr NTR share a remarkable bond off-screen, with their friendship contributing to SS Rajamouli’s Oscar-winning film RRR.

  • Charan expressed his envy towards Jr NTR during the Komaram Bheemudo song scene.
  • In the Netflix documentary RRR: Behind & Beyond, Charan reflected on Jr NTR's powerful emotional performance.
  • Director SS Rajamouli praised Jr NTR's scenes in the documentary.
“I felt jealous during the Komaram Bheemudo song, where Tarak delivered a powerful performance using just his eyes.” - Ram Charan

The documentary provides an in-depth look at the collaboration between Charan, Jr NTR, and Rajamouli, celebrating their historic cinematic achievement.

item.title: Baby John Box Office Day 2: Scores 46% Lower Second Day Than Varun Dhawan’s Bhediya, Budget Recovery Is Impossible? - Koimoi
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Day 2: Scores 46% Lower Second Day Than Varun Dhawan’s Bhediya

Date: December 2024 | Source: Koimoi

The action thriller 'Baby John', featuring Varun Dhawan and Keerthy Suresh, has underperformed at the box office, experiencing a significant drop in earnings on its second day.

  • The film opened with a collection of 11.25 crores but dropped to 5.13 crores on day 2.
  • This marks a 46% decline compared to its opening earnings.
  • 'Baby John' is facing tough competition from other releases like Pushpa 2 and Mufasa: The Lion King.
  • It is projected that the film may struggle to recover its reported budget of 160 crores.
“At the current pace, it looks difficult for Varun Dhawan starrer to even accumulate 75 crores in its lifetime.”

The weekend ahead is critical for 'Baby John' to recover its box office performance amidst strong competition.

item.title: Twinkle Khanna on moving to the UK with daughter Nitara, Akshay Kumar’s response: ‘He was fine but even if he wasn’t supportive…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Twinkle Khanna on moving to the UK with daughter Nitara, Akshay Kumar’s response: ‘He was fine but even if he wasn’t supportive…’

Publication Date: [Insert Date Here] Source: The Indian Express

Twinkle Khanna decided to continue her education at the age of 49 and moved to the UK to study further. After pursuing a few short online courses during the pandemic, she decided to continue her academics full-time.

  • Twinkle’s son Aarav and she ended up in different colleges, but she felt it was essential to move with her younger daughter, Nitara.
  • She highlighted her unconventional upbringing which made her value independence in decision-making.
  • Twinkle praised her husband, Akshay Kumar, for his support regarding her relocation, adding that she would have moved regardless of his agreement.
  • Akshay expressed pride in Twinkle’s dedication during her university journey and celebrated her graduation.
“I was very lucky that my family supported me. Even if he would not have been fine, I would have still done it.” – Twinkle Khanna

This move underscores the importance of education and personal development for individuals at any age, highlighting how support systems play a critical role in such decisions.

item.title: Game Changer: Pre-release business in the north picks up - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer: Pre-release business in the north picks up

Published on Dec 27, 2024 | Source: 123Telugu

Game Changer is an eagerly awaited Telugu film set for release on January 10, 2024. The film has gained significant buzz through its promotions and is also making strides in Hindi-speaking regions.

  • The pre-release business for Game Changer has been finalized at a good price.
  • Ram Charan stars in a double role, building on his celebrity after the success of RRR.
  • Directed by Shankar and produced by Dil Raju, the film has a high budget and significant expectations.
  • There is confidence that Game Changer will perform well at the box office.
“Dil Raju is confident that Game Changer will be a major success at the box office.”

The excitement surrounding Game Changer highlights the film's potential impact on the Telugu film industry and its reception in various markets.

item.title: Max Box Office Day 2: Only 3.51 Crores Away From Creating History With Highest Opening Weekend In Sandalwood! - Koimoi
item.description:
Max Box Office Day 2: Only 3.51 Crores Away From Creating History With Highest Opening Weekend In Sandalwood!

Date: December 26, 2024 Source: Koimoi

Kannada action thriller Max began on an impressive note at the box office. Kichcha Sudeep starrer has unfortunately witnessed a big drop on its second day, despite good reviews.

  • Day 1: 8.7 crores
  • Day 2: 4 crores
  • Total: 12.7 crores

Over 50% drop

As per Sacnilk, Max earned around 4 crores on its day 2 at the Kannada box office. It has witnessed a drop of 54% compared to 8.7 crores on day 1, registering the highest opening for a Sandalwood film in 2024.

Kichcha Sudeep starrer Max only needs 3.51 crores more to score the biggest opening weekend of Sandalwood in 2024.

Stay tuned to Koimoi for more box office updates!

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Kashish Kapoor gets into a heated argument with Salman Khan; host slams her “don’t be like - The Times of India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Kashish Kapoor gets into a heated argument with Salman Khan; host slams her “don’t be like that with me”

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Not specified

In a recent episode of Bigg Boss 18, Kashish Kapoor found herself in a heated exchange with host Salman Khan. The argument escalated, leading to Salman urging Kashish not to exhibit disrespectful behavior towards him.

  • Kashish Kapoor expressed her frustrations during the episode.
  • Salman Khan reprimanded her, emphasizing the importance of respect.
  • The argument attracted significant attention from viewers and fans of the show.
“Don’t be like that with me,” Salman told Kashish, highlighting the tensions of the moment.

This incident has sparked discussions among fans about the dynamics of respect and conduct within the reality show format.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun starrer hits 1250cr in India in 3 weeks - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collections: Allu Arjun Starrer Hits 1250 Cr in India in 3 Weeks

Date & Source: Updated on Dec 27, 2024 | Pinkvilla

Pushpa 2 has achieved remarkable success at the box office, crossing Rs. 1250 crore in just three weeks. The film is now closing in on the all-time record held by Baahubali 2.

  • Total gross of Pushpa 2 now stands at Rs. 1257.50 crore.
  • The film grossed Rs. 147.50 crore in its third week alone.
  • It is currently second only to Baahubali 2, being just Rs. 90 crore away from beating its record.
  • The film has performed especially well during the Christmas/New Year holidays.
  • Pushpa 2 has become the second highest-grossing film in Telugu states.
“Riding on its strong momentum and the boost from the New Year holidays, Pushpa 2 is well-positioned to rewrite box office history.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2's box office performance sets it on course to possibly becoming the highest-grossing Indian film ever, showcasing the power of star power and strategic release timing.

item.title: 'A farewell like no other': Emotional scenes as people bid adieu to literary colossus MT Vasudevan Nair - The Times of India
item.description:
Emotional Farewell to MT Vasudevan Nair, a Literary Legend

Publication Date: [Insert Date Here] | Source: [Insert Source Here]

Thousands gathered to pay their respects to the iconic Malayalam author MT Vasudevan Nair, who passed away. The emotional scenes highlighted his immense impact on literature and culture.

  • MT Vasudevan Nair was a prominent figure in Malayalam literature.
  • His works had a profound influence on readers and writers alike.
  • Ceremonies included heartfelt tributes from fans and fellow authors.
  • His death marks a significant loss in the literary community.
“A farewell like no other,” expressed one attendee, reflecting the deep emotional resonance of the day.

This farewell underscores the lasting legacy of MT Vasudevan Nair and highlights the deep connection he had with his readers and fans.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Rajat’s encounter with Santa and children makes him remember Savi and Sai - India Forums
item.description:
Rajat Reflects on His Actions Toward Savi in Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin

Published: Friday, December 27, 2024 at 6:53 AM

The popular show Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin continues to captivate fans with its enthralling storyline, highlighting Rajat's complex feelings for Savi amid escalating tensions.

Key Points:

  • Rajat confronts his behavior towards Savi, which he deeply regrets.
  • Savi stands her ground against Rajat, asserting her self-respect.
  • The tension is heightened by another character, Arsh, who seeks to sabotage their relationship.
  • Rajat encounters emotions triggered by Christmas festivities, reflecting on his relationship with Savi and Sai.
"Rajat feels extremely embarrassed and guilty after realizing the impact of his actions on Savi."

As the storyline unfolds, viewers are left questioning whether Rajat and Savi will reconcile after this conflict.

item.title: Naga Vamsi gives a key update on Mokshagnya’s next - 123telugu
item.description:
Naga Vamsi Gives a Key Update on Mokshagnya’s Next

Published on Dec 27, 2024 | Source: 123telugu.com

Nandamuri Mokshagnya is set to collaborate with director Venky Atluri for his second film, with the project awaiting official confirmation.

  • Naga Vamsi confirms Balakrishna's approval for Mokshagnya's project with Venky Atluri.
  • Balakrishna exhibited confidence in Venky Atluri's filmmaking style during a special screening.
  • Mokshagnya is also working on his debut film under director Prasanth Varma, which is in progress.
“While watching a special screening of Lucky Baskhar, Balayya Garu confirmed Mokshagnya’s film with Venky Atluri. He appreciated the director’s craft...” - Naga Vamsi

Stay tuned for more updates regarding Mokshagnya's projects and developments in Telugu cinema.

item.title: INSIDE PICS from Salman Khan's 59th birthday celebrations with family and friends; 'Sikandar' star cuts c - TOI Etimes
item.description:
INSIDE PICS from Salman Khan's 59th birthday celebrations with family and friends; 'Sikandar' star cuts cake with niece Ayat

Publication Date: December 27, 2024
Source: Times of India

Bollywood superstar Salman Khan celebrated his 59th birthday with a grand gathering of close friends and family, hosting a more intimate bash at his sister Arpita Khan Sharma's residence, rather than his usual Panvel farmhouse party.

  • Salman cut multiple birthday cakes, including a large chocolate cake.
  • He celebrated alongside his niece Ayat, who also had her own 4-tiered butterfly cake.
  • Notable attendees included Salman’s family and several Bollywood stars like Riteish Deshmukh, Genelia Deshmukh, and Bobby Deol.
  • Salman shared a sweet moment with his lady love Iulia Vantur, who captured the occasion on her phone.
  • His bodyguard Shera shared a heartfelt post about the celebrations on social media.
  • Salman is preparing for the trailer launch of his new film 'Sikandar'.
“Mere MAALIK ka birthday hai, love MAALIK (It’s my master’s birthday).” - Shera

In conclusion, Salman Khan's birthday was a joyful family affair celebrating both his milestone and that of his niece, highlighting the close-knit nature of his relationships in a festive atmosphere.

item.title: Salman Khan's bodyguard Shera excited to celebrate 59th birthday of his ‘maalik’. See pic - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Salman Khan turns 59 on Friday, December 27

Date: December 27, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Salman Khan is busy celebrating his 59th birthday today. His loyal bodyguard Shera shared a picture with the actor to wish him on this special occasion.

  • Shera shared a picture on Instagram from Salman's midnight birthday celebration.
  • Salman looked dapper in a black T-shirt and brown jacket.
  • The celebration was attended by close friends and family, including Salman's brothers Arbaaz and Sohail Khan.
  • The Sikandar teaser launch has been postponed due to the death of former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh.
“In light of the passing of our esteemed former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh Ji, we regret to announce that the release of the Sikandar teaser has been postponed.”

This birthday celebration highlights the strong bond between Salman Khan and his bodyguard Shera, as well as the respect within the film community during times of mourning.

item.title: How Zayed Khan went from 'hero with 1 hit, 13 flops' to 1500 cr net worth; is richer than Allu Arjun, Prabhas, Ranbir - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Zayed Khan's Rise: From Flops to ₹1500 Crore Net Worth

Date: Dec 27, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Zayed Khan, despite a career marked by numerous failures at the box office, has achieved remarkable financial success with a net worth reportedly around ₹1500 crore, surpassing better-known contemporaries.

  • Zayed Khan debuted in 2003 but only had one hit, Chura Liyaa Hai Tumne.
  • He faced a series of flops over the years, with only one successful film in 15 attempts.
  • Transitioning from acting, Zayed successfully invested in startups and diverse businesses.
  • His net worth exceeds those of popular actors like Ranbir Kapoor, Prabhas, and Allu Arjun.
Zayed Khan's advice: 'Live within your means.' He remarked on the pressures of social media and financial struggles many face.

This story exemplifies how individuals can pivot from setbacks in one domain to success in another, highlighting resilience and adaptability in personal finance and career choices.

item.title: Govinda’s wife Sunita Ahuja opens up about infidelity in marriages: ‘The other woman’s stench won’t leave him for years’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Govinda’s wife Sunita Ahuja opens up about infidelity in marriages: ‘The other woman’s stench won’t leave him for years’

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: The Indian Express

In a candid interview, Sunita Ahuja, wife of Bollywood actor Govinda, shared her thoughts on infidelity within marriages, emphasizing the challenges couples face.

  • Sunita and Govinda have been married for nearly 40 years but still engage in verbal disagreements.
  • She advises women against assuming their partners are loyal, warning about the lasting impact of infidelity.
  • Sunita reflected on their relationship dynamics, including how they address each other informally.
  • The couple has weathered numerous ups and downs throughout their long marriage.
  • Govinda’s past engagement with another actress was mentioned, illustrating their complex relationship history.
“I would like to fold my hands and tell women that don’t ever say that your partner is innocent (doesn’t cheat).”

This interview sheds light on the realities of long-term relationships, particularly the challenges posed by infidelity and the importance of communication.

item.title: ‘Kapil Sharma wanted to beat KRK up, broke glasses at his Dubai house; Honey Singh pulled his hair’: Mika Singh - The Indian Express
item.description:
Mika Singh Reveals Drama Between Kapil Sharma and KRK

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: The Indian Express

Mika Singh recently shared insights into his past relationship with KRK, highlighting a series of incidents where celebrities, including Kapil Sharma and Honey Singh, confronted KRK about his comments.

  • Mika Singh used to have a personal relationship with KRK and often mediated disputes among celebrities.
  • In an interview, Mika described a confrontation where Honey Singh pulled KRK's hair during a heated exchange.
  • Kapil Sharma, very upset with KRK, once wanted to confront him physically, leading to a disturbance at KRK's house.
“When he realised that KRK was my neighbour, Kapil wanted to just beat him up.” - Mika Singh

The incidents mentioned by Mika Singh reveal a deeper dynamic within the Bollywood circle and the tensions caused by public comments made by KRK.

item.title: Sajid Nadiadwala and Salman Khan’s Sikandar teaser delayed in respect of Manmohan Singh’s demise - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Sikandar Teaser Postponed to Honor Dr. Manmohan Singh

Publication Date: December 27, 2024 Source: Bollywood Hungama

In respect of the late former Prime Minister of India, Dr. Manmohan Singh, the teaser for Salman Khan's film Sikandar has been postponed to December 28.

  • The teaser was initially set for release on December 27 at 11:07 AM, coinciding with Khan's birthday.
  • Nadiadwala Grandson announced the postponement via social media.
  • Dr. Manmohan Singh passed away on December 26 at the age of 92.
  • Singh's contributions to India’s economic policies earned him immense respect.
“In light of the passing of our esteemed former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh Ji, we regret to announce that the release of the Sikandar teaser has been postponed.” - #TeamSikandar

The decision reflects the team's respect for the late leader during a time of national mourning.

item.title: Salman Khan’s Sikandar teaser delayed in respect of Manmohan Singh’s demise - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Salman Khan's Sikandar Teaser Postponed Due to Manmohan Singh's Demise

Publication Date: December 27, 2024 Source: Bollywood Hungama

In a mark of respect to the late former Prime Minister Dr. Manmohan Singh, the makers of Salman Khan’s film Sikandar have postponed the teaser's release originally set for December 27.

  • The teaser will now be released on December 28 at 11:07 AM.
  • The decision comes after Singh's passing on December 26 at the age of 92.
  • The makers expressed condolences in their official statement.
  • Singh served as India’s Prime Minister from 2004 to 2014 and was a key figure in economic reforms.
“In light of the passing of our esteemed former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh Ji, we regret to announce that the release of the Sikandar teaser has been postponed to 28th December 11:07 AM. Our thoughts are with the nation during this time of mourning.” — Nadiadwala Grandson

The postponement reflects the filmmakers' respect for Singh's legacy and the sentiments of the nation.

item.title: Suhana Khan, Agastya Nanda to celebrate New Year at Shah Rukh's farmhouse? Rumoured couple spotted together in Alibaug - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Suhana Khan and Agastya Nanda Spotted Together in Alibaug, Rumored to Celebrate New Year's at Shah Rukh's Farmhouse

Date: Dec 27, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Suhana Khan, daughter of Shah Rukh Khan, and Agastya Nanda, grandson of Amitabh Bachchan, were recently seen in Alibaug, leading to speculation about their relationship as they plan to celebrate New Year's together.

  • Suhana and Agastya have been previously spotted together, prompting dating rumors.
  • The pair was caught on video by fans while enjoying a walk and boarding a speed boat.
  • Suhana wore a stylish outfit while Agastya sported casual attire from his brother's brand.
  • The duo is rumored to welcome the New Year at Shah Rukh Khan's luxurious farmhouse in Alibaug.
  • Both are set to make their film debuts after starring in Zoya Akhtar's upcoming project, The Archies.
“If reports are to be believed, Suhana and Agastya are all set to ring in the New Year together in SRK's farmhouse.”

The sighting of Suhana Khan and Agastya Nanda has stirred excitement among fans, hinting at a blossoming romance as they prepare for their cinematic debuts.

item.title: Pakistani actress Hania Aamir breaks silence on the Dallas event, accuses event organisers of assault: 'J - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Hania Aamir Addresses Assault Claims at Dallas Event

Date: October 2023

Source: Unknown

Pakistani actress Hania Aamir has spoken out regarding her experience at a recent event in Dallas, where she alleges that the event organizers assaulted her. She emphasizes the challenges faced by women in male-dominated industries.

  • Hania Aamir claims to have been assaulted by event organizers.
  • She highlights the difficulties women encounter in predominantly male fields.
  • The incident has sparked a conversation about women's safety and treatment in the entertainment industry.
“Just because us women are in male-dominated fields doesn't mean we should tolerate such behavior.”

This incident underscores the ongoing issues surrounding women's safety and respect in the workplace, particularly in male-dominated sectors.

item.title: Salman Khan's Sikandar teaser release postponed to Saturday after Manmohan Singh's demise - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Salman Khan's Sikandar Teaser Release Postponed After Manmohan Singh's Death

Publication Date: Dec 27, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

On the occasion of Salman Khan's 59th birthday, the teaser launch for his upcoming film Sikandar was set for today but has been postponed following the death of former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh.

  • The teaser was scheduled to be released at 11:07 AM on December 27, 2024.
  • The production house confirmed the postponement via their official social media handle.
  • Manmohan Singh passed away at age 92 due to age-related medical issues.
  • Singh was Prime Minister of India from 2004 to 2014 and was a significant figure in India's economic policy.
“In light of the passing of our esteemed former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh Ji, we regret to announce that the release of the Sikandar teaser has been postponed to 28th December 11:07 AM.” - Team Sikandar

The portrayal of Salman Khan in Sikandar sparked excitement among fans, with further details expected to be shared on the new teaser release date.
